snippet: The surprise omissions of Thursday suggest a replay of the 1999 race when a favored epic ("Saving Private Ryan") was beat by a heartwarming romance ("Shakespeare in Love").
abstract: The surprise omissions of Thursday suggest a replay of the 1999 race when a favored epic ("Saving Private Ryan") was beat by a heartwarming romance ("Shakespeare in Love").

headline.main: Director Snubs Point to a Threeway Race: 'Lincoln' vs. 'Playbook' and 'Pi'
